Game.Name: ESPN X-Games Skateboarding (Japan) (En)
Game.plot: ESPN X-Games Skateboarding features eight different pro skateboarders, including Bob Burnquist and Chris Senn. Choose from X Games, Free Skate, and X-Rage modes. A tutorial helps you increase your gameplay skills. You can also practice more than 40 tricks to earn experience points for higher jumps, improved balance, and increased speed.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/529437.html
